nodes.text: The Greater Menagerie was a Rakatan vault in the the Tomb, an ancient prison on the planet Belsavis. Located in the Ancient Stasis Zone of the Tomb, the vault was used to contain monstrous creatures from the time of the Infinite Empire, and one of those creatures attempted to break out of the Menagerie's lower levels after the facility was damaged during the invasion of Belsavis. However, Captain Valn recruited Republic individuals to seal the creature back into the Menagerie.
The Greater Menagerie appears as a location on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, and is the site of the Republic mission "Containing the Beast."
